#summary Release roadmap for ZDStack

= Version 0.9.1 =
  * Add JSON-RPC as an RPC protocol option
  * Add [http://code.google.com/p/zdstack/wiki/Plugins Plugin] system
  * Change the representation of Frags/Deaths
  * Added LICENSE file, changed license to MIT license
  * Fix a few threading (100% CPU Usage) bugs

= Version 0.9.2 =
 * Add authentication
 * Add client-log parse utility and ZDWebStats interface
 * Add global ban/whitelist
 * Add CSV export to ZDWebStats
 * Add ConnectionQualityStatistics

= Version 0.9.3 =
  * Fix bugs :)
  * Add a test suite
  * Solidify API
  * Document classes, functions, variables & methodology

Subsequent releases will be Release Candidates, with no substantial changes apart from:
  * Test suite modification
  * Documentation addition and correction
  * Bug fixing
